messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom]Was Christian viewpoints  now unschooling church/reli...
messages.msgSnippet: I think Karen Armstrong has written a book about God that looks at the major religions. The title has God in it, but I forget the rest. It s pretty easy to
messages.messageBody:
I think Karen Armstrong has written a book about "God" that looks at the
major religions. The title has "God" in it, but I forget the rest. It's
pretty easy to find.
s.

> In a message dated 11/7/2002 12:16:40 PM Eastern Standard Time,
> SandraDodd@... writes:
>
>
> >  I would like to see the comparisons drawn between Jesus, Buddha, 
> > and Muhhamad (sp), or other types of figures in religions.
>
> Usborne makes a new internet-linked Encyclopedia of World Religions
> that I
> personally really enjoyed.
> Amy Kagey

In a message dated 11/7/2002 12:16:40 PM Eastern Standard Time,
SandraDodd@... writes:


> I would like to see the comparisons drawn between Jesus, Buddha,
> and Muhhamad (sp), or other types of figures in religions.

Usborne makes a new internet-linked Encyclopedia of World Religions that I
personally really enjoyed.
Amy Kagey
